solvents.name: methanol
solvents.amount: 5.0 ml for pyrazine solution, 5.0 ml for CuSiF6 solution

PXRD.equipment: Panalytical X’pert PRO MPD X-ray Diffractometer
PXRD.conditions: Cu Ka radiation (λ = 0.15418 nm, 45 kV, 40 mA)

low_pressure_adsorption.equipment: Autosorb-1C (Quantachrome Instruments) Surface Area and Porosity Analyzer
low_pressure_adsorption.activation_conditions: degassed at room temperature under high vacuum (≤5 mm Hg) for 12 h, then to 323 K for another 12 h

column_breakthrough_tests.equipment: stainless steel column (27 mm length, 4 mm inner diameter)
column_breakthrough_tests.activation_conditions: treated at 298 K overnight under helium flow of 5 ml min⁻¹ at 323 K
